DOC.brief_summary: Recent report show increase prevalence obesity patient type 1 diabetes ( T1DP ) study state patient type 2 diabetes ( T2DPs ) islet cell auto-antibodies . These result raise question common pathway T1DM T2DM via association T helper cell . In study investigator aim investigate difference T helper 1 ( Th1 ) cytokines level T1DPs , T2DPs healthy subject . The study include 114 T1DPs insulin treatment , 35 newly diagnose T2DPs use oral antidiabetic insulin 31 healthy subject ( CG ) . Serum interferon gamma ( IFN-γ ) , interleukin-2 ( IL-2 ) tumor necrosis factor alpha ( TNF-α ) level measure use ELISA method . Serum level cytokine T1DPs compare T2DPs control .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Th1 Cytokine Levels Between Type 1 Type 2 Diabetes
